comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - create a report
   - create a data source using sampleDB
   - create a data set using the data source

expected behavior:

   - data source and data set are created without any error

actual behavior:

   - exceptions were thrown in error log when creating data source and data set
   - data set could not be created from the data source
